comments.body: Why do you not use the `account.monitor_log` but implement your own method?

to avoid timing issues.  `account.monitor_log` is best used immediately after some action, but in this test, there are several instances where I want to go back and verify behavior by looking at the entire log file.  I've also encountered failures with `monitor_log` and when going back to the `stdout` file and see the expected result in the file.  

 Note I think this approach could help EOS tests.
Thanks for pointing out. Wondering if we should improve `monitor_log` directly?

> helps with rebalance times

How is this validated?
the timeout for verifying the transition from `REBALANCING to RUNNING` is set somewhat strict (20 seconds)
